channel.title: Noobs crashing
channel.description: Ok when you log into my server i have a big warning sign telling players if they are not on my client they can no use pkisland and extra portals now these noobs dont read and crash and cant reconnect so is there a way to make it so a warning sign pops up when you click on them by the way there on tabs.

item.title: Noobs crashing
item.dc:creator: @codeusa codeusa
item.description:
@codeusa wrote:

Ok when you log into my server i have a big warning sign telling players if they are not on my client they can no use pkisland and extra portals now these noobs dont read and crash and cant reconnect so is there a way to make it so a warning sign pops up when you click on them by the way there on tabs.
